	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy

	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents

	- EventStructWrongData.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.24 (0x3a2fd07ec2ad6f355f93af695a7cf858f5967b78.sol#1)
